channel.title: I saw a tut on here that would really help me right now please help me read this
channel.description:
it made admins inable to drop, trade, or pk players. would really be helpfull, thanks
please respond if you know anything about this thanks

item.title: I saw a tut on here that would really help me right now please help me read this
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

i want REAL staff, to take care of the server get ride of rule breakers, mute spammers. not spawn all day for the hell of it.
if they are rewarded with staff they get a level 126 admin account, that’s what im trying at, they still have there origanal account. if they choose to play on it, that’s fine.

Read full topic

item.title: I saw a tut on here that would really help me right now please help me read this
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:2, topic:221647"][code]if (playerRights == 3) {
tradeDropPk == false;
}{/code]

You need to make the tradeDropPk method on your own.
You are going to want to put that in your process.[/code][/quote]
thanks for the help… >_>[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2008, 02:08:52 AM[/size][hr][quote="-Austin-, post:3, topic:221647"]why would u want that on ur server anyways? lmao[/quote]

because i don’t like admins spawnning shit then giving it away and going, don’t tell the owner… shh…
even if you do ban them you need staff. so im ganna fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: I saw a tut on here that would really help me right now please help me read this
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[code]if (playerRights == 3) {
tradeDropPk == false;
}{/code]

You need to make the tradeDropPk method on your own.
You are going to want to put that in your process.[/code]

Read full topic
